languages.text: "И...и... Держитесь подальше от распределителя пищи! Говорят, там орудует буйный Кошмар. Много наших сгинуло в попытке остановить его — и ни один, с-слышите, ни один не вернулся!"

traits.locale_text: "И...и... Держитесь подальше от распределителя пищи! Говорят, там орудует буйный Кошмар. Много наших сгинуло в попытке остановить его — и ни один, с-слышите, ни один не вернулся!"
traits.speaker: Prisoner

languages.text: "And... and... keep away from the feeding bay! They say a furious Nightmare is roaming the area. Many of us have died trying to stop it — not one of them came back! Not a single soul did, you h-hear?"
languages.original_text: "И...и... Держитесь подальше от распределителя пищи! Говорят, там орудует буйный Кошмар. Много наших сгинуло в попытке остановить его — и ни один, с-слышите, ни один не вернулся!"

traits.locale_text: "And... and... Keep away from the feeding bay! They say a furious Nightmare is haunting the area. Many of us perished trying to stop it, and nobody came back! Not a single soul did, you h-hear?"
traits.speaker: Prisoner

traits.locale_text: "And... and... Keep away from the feeding bay! They say a furious Nightmare is haunting the area. Many of us perished trying to stop it, and nobody came back! Not a single soul did, you h-hear?"
traits.speaker: Prisoner

traits.locale_text: "And... and... Keep away from the feeding bay! They say a furious Nightmare is haunting the area. Many of us perished trying to stop it, and nobody came back! Not a single soul did, you h-hear?"
traits.speaker: Prisoner

traits.locale_text: "And... and... Keep away from the feeding bay! They say a furious Nightmare is haunting the area. Many of us perished trying to stop it, and nobody came back! Not a single soul did, you h-hear?"
traits.speaker: Prisoner

traits.locale_text: "And... and... keep away from the feeding bay! They say a furious Nightmare is roaming the area. Many of us have died trying to stop it — not one of them came back! Not a single soul did, you h-hear?"
traits.speaker: Prisoner

traits.locale_text: "And... and... keep away from the feeding bay! They say a furious Nightmare is roaming the area. Many of us have died trying to stop it — not one of them came back! Not a single soul did, you h-hear?"
traits.speaker: Prisoner

languages.text: “还有……还有……离喂食区远点！他们都说，有只暴怒的梦魇在那里游荡。我们之中有很多人都打算消灭它，但那些人全都死了，谁都没回来！连一个人都没有回来，你……你听明白了吗？”
languages.original_text: "And... and... keep away from the feeding bay! They say a furious Nightmare is roaming the area. Many of us have died trying to stop it — not one of them came back! Not a single soul did, you h-hear?"

traits.locale_text: “还有……还有……离喂食区远点！他们都说，有只暴怒的梦魇在那里游荡。我们之中有很多人都打算消灭它，但那些人全都死了，谁都没回来！连一个人都没有回来，你……你听明白了吗？”
traits.speaker: Prisoner

languages.text: «Y... y... ¡aléjense de la bahía de alimentación! Dicen que hay una pesadilla furiosa por la zona. Muchos han ido a intentar detenerla, ¡y nadie ha vuelto! Ni un alma, ¿e-entiende?».
languages.original_text: "And... and... keep away from the feeding bay! They say a furious Nightmare is roaming the area. Many of us have died trying to stop it — not one of them came back! Not a single soul did, you h-hear?"

traits.locale_text: «Y... y... ¡aléjense de la bahía de alimentación! Dicen que hay una pesadilla furiosa por la zona. Muchos han ido a intentar detenerla, ¡y nadie ha vuelto! Ni un alma, ¿e-entiende?».
traits.speaker: Prisoner

languages.text: 「それと…あとは…給餌窓には近づかないでください！怒ったナイトメアがそのエリアを歩き回ってるって、聞きました。多くの仲間がナイトメアを止めようとして死んだんです…誰も戻ってきませんでした！魂ひとつもですよ、い、いいですか？」
languages.original_text: "And... and... keep away from the feeding bay! They say a furious Nightmare is roaming the area. Many of us have died trying to stop it — not one of them came back! Not a single soul did, you h-hear?"

traits.locale_text: 「それと…あとは…給餌窓には近づかないでください！怒ったナイトメアがそのエリアを歩き回ってるって、聞きました。多くの仲間がナイトメアを止めようとして死んだんです…誰も戻ってきませんでした！魂ひとつもですよ、い、いいですか？」
traits.speaker: Prisoner

languages.text: « Et... Et... n'approchez pas de la baie d'alimentation ! On raconte qu'un cauchemar enragé traîne dans ce secteur. Plusieurs d'entre nous ont essayé de l'arrêter... mais aucun n'est revenu ! Aucun, vous m'entendez ? »
languages.original_text: "And... and... keep away from the feeding bay! They say a furious Nightmare is roaming the area. Many of us have died trying to stop it — not one of them came back! Not a single soul did, you h-hear?"

traits.locale_text: « Et... Et... n'approchez pas de la baie d'alimentation ! On raconte qu'un cauchemar enragé traîne dans ce secteur. Plusieurs d'entre nous ont essayé de l'arrêter... mais aucun n'est revenu ! Aucun, vous m'entendez ? »
traits.speaker: Prisoner

languages.text: "Und ... und ... haltet Euch von dem Fütterungsmodul fern! Ein wilder Albtraum soll diesen Bereich heimsuchen. Viele von uns sind bei dem Versuch, ihn aufzuhalten, gestorben – kein Einziger ist zurückgekommen! Keine einzige Seele, v-versteht Ihr?"
languages.original_text: "And... and... keep away from the feeding bay! They say a furious Nightmare is roaming the area. Many of us have died trying to stop it — not one of them came back! Not a single soul did, you h-hear?"

traits.speaker: Prisoner
